itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying raccoon, monkey, or weasel hide. It requires the knowledge of Drying: Beginner.

※ Find Techthon in Heidel and complete the Need for Soft Hide! Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Raccoon Hide
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted raccoon corpse.

item.name: Monkey Hide
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted monkey corpse.

item.name: Weasel Hide
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted weasel corpse.

item.name: Thin Hide
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying raccoon, monkey, or weasel hide.

item.name: Supreme Thin Hide
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Shaking Fine Thin Hide and Leather Glaze, an ingredient made through Alchemy. It requires the knowledge of Shaking: Skilled.

※ Shaking: Skilled can be obtained as a challenge reward after achieving Processing Artisan Level 1.

item.name: Rhik Talisman of Temptation
item.desc: The energy of Temptation is contained within this Rhik Talisman.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Rhik Talisman of Temptation, Rhik Talisman

item.name: Rhik Talisman of Destruction
item.desc: The energy of Destruction is contained within this Rhik Talisman.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Rhik Talisman of Destruction, Rhik Talisman

item.name: Ultimate Jubre Talisman
item.desc: A Jubre Talisman developed to its maximum potential.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Jubre Talisman of Crimson Flame, Jubre Talisman of Destruction, Jubre Talisman of Temptation, Jubre Talisman
